FOCUSED_ON_VARIETY.name: Focused on Variety
FOCUSED_ON_VARIETY.description: So many ingredients! Your table has become colorful!

NUTRITIONALLY_BALANCED.name: Nutritionally Balanced
NUTRITIONALLY_BALANCED.description: Balanced meal: Carbs, Protein, and Vitamins

BODY_BUILDER.name: Body Builder
BODY_BUILDER.description: You're swole from all that muscle food!

HEALTHY_FLOW.name: Healthy Flow
HEALTHY_FLOW.description: With all those veggies, your blood must be super smooth!

SUSHI_CHEF.name: Sushi Chef
SUSHI_CHEF.description: A true artisan who has mastered sushi!

SANDWICH_EARL.name: Sandwich Earl
SANDWICH_EARL.description: Even Mr. Sandwich (John Montagu) would be surprised—what a noble palate!

TACO_ESTETA.name: Taco Esteta
TACO_ESTETA.description: A gourmet of tacos. You wear that sombrero well!

CURRY_MAHARAJA.name: Curry Maharaja
CURRY_MAHARAJA.description: You've built a kingdom of aromatic spices!

SELECTIVE_EATER.name: Selective Eater
SELECTIVE_EATER.description: That dedication to single-mindedly pursuing one flavor—so admirable!

FISHERMAN.name: Fisherman
FISHERMAN.description: A true fisherman who knows all the blessings of the sea!

FARMER.name: Farmer
FARMER.description: The strength of a farmer who lives with the soil has reached your table!

LIVESTOCK_FARMER.name: Livestock Farmer
LIVESTOCK_FARMER.description: A livestock farmer raising animals with lots of love!

HUMPTY_DUMPTY.name: Humpty Dumpty
HUMPTY_DUMPTY.description: An egg lover that would surprise even the always-smiling Humpty Dumpty!

MAES_TORO.name: Maes'Toro
MAES_TORO.description: Maes'Toro, master of tuna, wins thunderous applause again today!

POPEYE.name: Popeye
POPEYE.description: Like power-packed Popeye, your nutrition is fully charged!

COWBOY.name: Cowboy
COWBOY.description: Like a cowboy riding the wilds, an adventurer in pursuit of freedom and flavor!

QUICK_DECISION_MAKER.name: Quick Decision Maker
QUICK_DECISION_MAKER.description: Amazing decision-making speed! You never hesitate, even in a pinch!

LAID_BACK_AND_STEADY.name: Laid Back and Steady
LAID_BACK_AND_STEADY.description: Controlling life at your own pace—now that's cool!

UNIQUE_PALATE.name: Unique Palate
UNIQUE_PALATE.description: Your sense of taste is one of a kind!

REFINED_PALATE.name: Refined Palate
REFINED_PALATE.description: Oh, traveler with a refined palate, your tongue is truly first-class!
